text:
Hello,
I followed all the instructions on that page: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/data/use-graphql-data-in-your-website-pages#pass-dynamic-context-into-a-query>. I am not able to pass dynamic context into a query. I was able to build dynamic pages and use the dynamic object CRM method, but I need to use GraphQl to get associations, and I am not able to do that.

At this time, I am only able to successfully bind GraphQL queries with collections only and hardcoded filters.
